medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, To indicate the type and function of a message and to transmit the identification of the message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify date and/or time relating to the message, such as the date and time the message is generated.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to provide information related to the message.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: To represent information about involved healthcare parties.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, To allocate a unique reference number to an individual party allowing each party to be referenced from other locations within the message.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
PNA, To specify information necessary to establish the identity of a healthcare party.
One occurrence of the segment is used to specify the identity details at one level. If both organisation, department and/or physician are to be specified then a separate occurrence of this segment has to be used for each of them.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To specify alternative identification numbers of a healthcare party.

medi:segment.name: Organisation classification details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SPR, To specify the medical speciality and type of a healthcare organisation.

medi:segment.name: Qualification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QUA, To specify the qualification of a healthcare professional.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, A segment to specify the type, medical speciality and the position or military rank of a healthcare professional.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, To specify an address of a healthcare party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, To specify a communication number of a party.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
RFF, A segment to specify a link to a higher level healthcare organisation which the actual healthcare organisation or healthcare professional is a part of.
This segment is only used if multiple occurrences of this segment group is needed to express the information of a healthcare party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: To specify a document or message to be returned to the actual party as a response to this message.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, To specify the type of the requested document or message.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, To identify the requested communication method.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: SG4-SG5-SG6-SG7 A group of segments to describe the subject of care.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify the type of subject of care such as a person, group of persons, an animal or a group of animals.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, To specify the name and official ID of the person or the identification of a group of persons, animal or animal group.

medi:segment.name: Person demographic information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PDI, To specify the gender of the person or animal.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To specify an alternative identification numbers for the subject of care.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify a date and/or time related to the subject of care such as date and time of birth or age.

medi:segment.name: Nationality
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAT, To specify the nationality of the person.

medi:segment.name: Agreement identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AGR, To specify the basis of entitlement to health services and any confidentiality constraint that applies to the handling of information about the subject of care.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic/class id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CCI, To specify the breed and species of an animal.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, To specify the authenticity of the person's identity by the prescriber, such as person known by prescriber, person unknown, etc.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to provide information relating to the subject of care, such as a confidentiality constraint concerning a person or age of a group of animals.

medi:segment.name: Language
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LAN, To specify the language of the person.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, To specify the person's ability in the language.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify any precaution advice concerning the subject of care.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, To specify a precaution as a code.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to specify a precaution.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify an associated date for the precaution such as start or end date and/or time.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to specify an address and related communication number(s) of the actual party.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, To specify an address of the subject of care.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, To specify a communication number for the subject of care at the specific address.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A segment group to provide information about a related party such as next-of-kin or animal carer.

medi:segment.name: Relationship
medi:segment.medi:documentation: REL, To specify the type of relationship between the subject of care and the related party.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, To specify information necessary to establish the identity of a related party.

medi:segment.name: Person demographic information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PDI, To specify the gender of the person.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, To specify an address of a patient related party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, To specify a communication number of a patient related party.

medi:segment.name: Language
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LAN, To specify a language of the person.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, To specify the person's ability in the language.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation:
Segment group 7: This segment group contains clinical information about the patient such as medical history, investigation results, medication records or allergies.
Each occurrence of this segment group provides information concerning a single clinical information item.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, To allocate an identification number to the clinical information item.

medi:segment.name: Clinical information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CIN, To specify the type of clinical information item and possibly a medical diagnosis.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify start and/or end date and/or time for the clinical information item and/or date and/or time of the origin of the clinical information item.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
PNA, To specify information necessary to establish the identity of the party providing the clinical information item.
One occurrence of the segment is used to specify the identity details at one level. If both organisation, department and/or physician are to be specified then a separate occurrence of this segment has to be used for each of them.

medi:segment.name: Language
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LAN, To specify the language of the clinical information item.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to specify an item of clinical information.

medi:segment.name: Result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RSL, To specify a clinical investigation result item, such as the height or weight of the subject of care or the result of a laboratory investigation.

medi:segment.name: Clinical intervention
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
CLI, To specify a clinical examination such as a height measurement.
Multiple occurrences of this segment may be needed if a multi-axial coding scheme is being used.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic/class id
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
CCI, To specify a characteristic of a laboratory investigation.
Multiple occurrences of this segment may be needed if a multi-axial coding scheme is being used.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to specify current or past medication or known allergy.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment to identify a medicinal product item.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, To specify the medicinal treatment status such as commenced, stopped or a patient allergy.

medi:segment.name: Dosage administration
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DSG, To specify the form of presentation or the route of administration of the medicinal product as well as dosage administration or trigger for administration.

medi:segment.name: Parties and instruction
medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, To specify an instruction for use.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to provide comments to dosage administration.

medi:segment.name: Scheduling conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SCC, To specify a dosage pattern as structured information.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, To specify a quantity concerning the medicine such as a single dose or strength of tablet.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: SG14 A group of segments to specify a set of prescriptions issued for a subject of care.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, To specify the service type of the prescription set such as a new prescription, a modification of an earlier prescription or cancellation of a prescription.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To identify the prescription set and the coding scheme used for identification of the medicinal product(s).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date and/or time relevant for the prescription set such as issue date of prescription set or requested date and time of dispensing.

medi:segment.name: Priority
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PTY, A segment to specify the requested priority for dispensing.

medi:segment.name: Agreement identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AGR, To specify the agreed disposal of the prescribed medicinal product(s) such as to be used by the client or for distribution.

medi:segment.name: Language
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LAN, A segment to specify the language of the prescription set.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, To specify the status of the prescription set such as requested, prescribed or dispensed.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to provide comments to the prescription set.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to specify a reference to a related message or document.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, To specify the type of message or document being referenced.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To identify a referenced message or document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify issue date and/or time for a referenced message or document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to specify where the dispensed medicine is to be delivered or collected.

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, To specify how the dispensed medicine(s) will be delivered or collected.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to specify the mode of transport for the delivery of dispensed medicine(s).

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to specify the delivery of the dispensed medicine(s).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date and/or time relevant for the delivery of the dispensed medicine(s) such as date and time of delivery.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment to specify the address for delivery of the dispensed medicine(s).

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a telecommunication number for the receiver at the dispensed medicine delivery point.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to identify the receiver of a dispensed medicine.

medi:segment.name: Priority
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PTY, A segment to specify the requested priority for the delivery of the dispensed medicine(s).

medi:segment.name: Package
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, To specify if special packaging is required.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments to specify the party responsible in part or in whole for the payment and the related payment conditions for the dispensed medicine(s) in the actual prescription set.

medi:segment.name: Financial charges allocation
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FCA, To specify the responsibility for the settlement of charges, i.e. whether the costs are to be paid by the patient, by private insurance, etc.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
PNA, To specify information necessary to establish the identity of the payer.
One occurrence of the segment is used to specify the identity details at one level. Thus two occurrences of this segment may be needed if both organisation and department are being used.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To identify a payer.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, To specify a national requirement or condition.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments to specify a payment condition.

medi:segment.name: Insurance cover description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ICD, To specify insurance cover type and care coverage.

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, To specify a reason for reduced or no payment.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentage to be paid as the contribution of the payer.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify a monetary amount as the contribution of the payer.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To specify a reference for the authorisation of this service.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date and/or time relevant to this payment condition such as date of authorisation.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: DTM-STS-CIN-FTX-SG15-SG16-SG17 A group of segments to specify the information about a single prescription item.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment to specify a prescription item identification and request for notification information related to variation in delivery such as a substituted item or delivery failure.

medi:segment.name: Dosage administration
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DSG, A segment to specify the form of presentation of the medicinal product.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment to identify a medicinal product item and the type of the item.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, To specify a quantity concerning the medicine regime such as number of units of supply or strength of tablet.

medi:segment.name: Product group information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PGI, A segment to specify the group in which the medicine belongs such as legal category or price category.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to specify the supplier of the medicinal product, the manufacturer of the medicinal product or the initial prescriber of the treatment.

medi:segment.name: Package
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, A segment to specify the type of package and the number of physical units.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To identify the package or to give an alternative identification of the initial authoriser.

medi:segment.name: Delivery limitations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DLM, To specify limitations on dispensing such as allowed substitution type if any.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, To specify the number of times dispensing to be repeated.

medi:segment.name: Process identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRC, A segment to specify information about the preparation of an extemporaneously dispensed medicine.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date and/or time or period concerning the prescribing of the dispensed medicine such as dispensing interval or initial date of treatment.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, To specify the status of the dispensed medicine provided such as requested, dispensed, etc.

medi:segment.name: Clinical information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CIN, To specify the indication for the prescribed item and/or comments concerning the prescribed item expressed as a clinical code.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, expressing the indication for the prescribed item, package description, comments concerning the prescribed item or other information about this prescription item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments to specify information about a single ingredient.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment to specify the function of the ingredient such as active or excipient ingredient.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment to identify the ingredient.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the quantity for an ingredient.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to provide comments about the ingredient.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments to specify how the dispensed medicine should be administered and used.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, To allocate a sequential regimen phase number.

medi:segment.name: Dosage administration
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
DSG, To specify how the dispensed medicine is administered.
If this information is provided in a structured way then this segment is used for route of administration or trigger for administration.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify a quantity related to dosage of the dispensed medicine such as the single dose or maximum daily dose.

medi:segment.name: Parties and instruction
medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, To instruct the dispenser that an exceptional dosage regimen is intended.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date and/or time or period concerning dosage of the dispensed medicine such as duration of treatment or time of administration.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, to provide information relating to the medicine dosage and administration.

medi:segment.name: Scheduling conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SCC, To specify a dosage pattern and dosage frequency as structured information.

medi:segment.name: Clinical information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CIN, A segment to specify the indication for the use of the dispensed medicine.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, To specify a cautionary or advisory label.

medi:segment.name: Language
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LAN, A segment to specify the language of the instructions.

medi:segment.name: Attached equipment
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQA, To specify device or equipment to be used for the administration of the dispensed medicine.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments to specify the party that is responsible in part or in whole for the payment of the actual prescription item and the related payment conditions.

medi:segment.name: Financial charges allocation
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FCA, To specify the responsibility for the settlement of charges, i.e. whether the costs are to be paid by the patient, by private insurance, etc.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
PNA, To specify information necessary to establish the identity of the payer.
One occurrence of the segment is used to specify the identity details at one level. Thus two occurrences of this segment may be needed if both organisation and department are being used.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To identify a payer.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, To specify a national requirement or condition.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments to specify a payment condition.

medi:segment.name: Insurance cover description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ICD, To specify the insurance cover type and care coverage.

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, To specify a reason for reduced or no payment.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentage to be paid as the contribution of the payer.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify a monetary amount as the contribution of the payer.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To specify a reference for the authorisation of this service.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date and/or time relevant to this payment condition such as date of authorisation.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment to provide the number of prescription items in the message.
